name: CreateSquareTerminalDeviceCode
description:
Generate a DeviceCode for Square Terminal login.

Creates a code for logging into a Square Terminal device in connected terminal mode. Useful for setting up devices for point-of-sale operations.

parameters.name: device_code_request
parameters.description: A JSON object containing the fields for creating a DeviceCode, including idempotency key and device details.

idempotency_key.description:
A unique string that identifies this CreateDeviceCode request. Keys can
be any valid string but must be unique for every CreateDeviceCode request.

See [Idempotency keys](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/idempotency) for more information.

id.description: The unique id for this device code.

name.description: An optional user-defined name for the device code.

code.description: The unique code that can be used to login.

device_id.description: The unique id of the device that used this code. Populated when the device is paired up.

location_id.description: The location assigned to this code.

pair_by.description: When this DeviceCode will expire and no longer login. Timestamp in RFC 3339 format.

created_at.description: When this DeviceCode was created. Timestamp in RFC 3339 format.

status_changed_at.description: When this DeviceCode's status was last changed. Timestamp in RFC 3339 format.

paired_at.description: When this DeviceCode was paired. Timestamp in RFC 3339 format.

value_schema.description:
An object containing the fields to POST for the request.

See the corresponding object definition for field details.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.
